prompts.title: Craft a Compelling Blog Post
prompts.prompt: Write a blog post outline and introduction on any topic you choose.
prompts.description: Generate a blog post outline and introduction on any topic.
prompts.bestFor: Writers looking to kickstart their articles.
prompts.exampleOutput: Outline: 1. Introduction, 2. Main Point One, 3. Main Point Two, 4. Conclusion. Introduction: ...
